segment.source: Computer Dialog Box (Windows 10)
segment.target: Computer Dialog Box (Windows 10)

segment.source: In Application Compatibility Manager (ACM), the Computer dialog box shows information about the selected computer.
segment.target: In Application Compatibility Manager (ACM), the Computer dialog box shows information about the selected computer.

segment.source: Computer Dialog Box
segment.target: Computer Dialog Box

segment.source: Applies to
segment.target: Applies to

segment.source: Windows 10
segment.target: Windows 10

segment.source: Windows 8.1
segment.target: Windows 8.1

segment.source: Windows 8
segment.target: Windows 8

segment.source: Windows 7
segment.target: Windows 7

segment.source: Windows Server 2012
segment.target: Windows Server 2012

segment.source: Windows Server 2008 R2
segment.target: Windows Server 2008 R2

segment.source: In Application Compatibility Manager (ACM), the Computer dialog box shows information about the selected computer.
segment.target: In Application Compatibility Manager (ACM), the Computer dialog box shows information about the selected computer.

segment.source: To open the Computer dialog box
segment.target: To open the Computer dialog box

segment.source: In ACM, in the Quick Reports pane, click Analyze.
segment.target: In ACM, in the Quick Reports pane, click Analyze.

segment.source: Under an operating system heading, click Computers.
segment.target: Under an operating system heading, click Computers.

segment.source: Double-click the name of a computer.
segment.target: Double-click the name of a computer.

segment.source: Tabs in the Computer dialog box
segment.target: Tabs in the Computer dialog box

segment.source: The following table shows the information available in the Computer dialog box.
segment.target: The following table shows the information available in the Computer dialog box.

segment.source: Tab
segment.target: Tab

segment.source: Information
segment.target: Information

segment.source: Details
segment.target: Details

segment.source: Shows the following information for the selected computer:
segment.target: Shows the following information for the selected computer:

segment.source: The computer name, operating system, architecture, and domain.
segment.target: The computer name, operating system, architecture, and domain.

segment.source: The IP address, Media Access Control (MAC) address, and hardware identifier.
segment.target: The IP address, Media Access Control (MAC) address, and hardware identifier.

segment.source: The manufacturer, asset tag, and system number.
segment.target: The manufacturer, asset tag, and system number.

segment.source: The hardware specifications.
segment.target: The hardware specifications.

segment.source: Applications
segment.target: Applications

segment.source: Shows the following information for each of the applications installed on the selected computer:
segment.target: Shows the following information for each of the applications installed on the selected computer:

segment.source: The application name, version number, and application vendor.
segment.target: The application name, version number, and application vendor.

segment.source: The compatibility rating for the application as determined by your organization.
segment.target: The compatibility rating for the application as determined by your organization.

segment.source: The compatibility information from the application vendor.
segment.target: The compatibility information from the application vendor.

segment.source: The compatibility information from the ACT Community, which you can view if you are a member of the ACT Community.
segment.target: The compatibility information from the ACT Community, which you can view if you are a member of the ACT Community.

segment.source: For more information, see Settings Dialog Box - Preferences Tab.
segment.target: For more information, see Settings Dialog Box - Preferences Tab.

segment.source: The issues that have been opened for the application.
segment.target: The issues that have been opened for the application.

segment.source: The count of computers in your organization on which the application is installed.
segment.target: The count of computers in your organization on which the application is installed.

segment.source: Devices
segment.target: Devices

segment.source: Shows the following information for each of the devices installed on the selected computer:
segment.target: Shows the following information for each of the devices installed on the selected computer:

segment.source: The model and manufacturer of the device.
segment.target: The model and manufacturer of the device.

segment.source: An evaluation of whether the device works on a 32-bit operating system or a 64-bit operating system.
segment.target: An evaluation of whether the device works on a 32-bit operating system or a 64-bit operating system.

segment.source: The class of device, as reported by the device.
segment.target: The class of device, as reported by the device.

segment.source: The count of computers in your organization on which the device is installed.
segment.target: The count of computers in your organization on which the device is installed.

segment.source: Labels
segment.target: Labels

segment.source: Shows the label for the selected computer.
segment.target: Shows the label for the selected computer.

segment.source: For information about labels, see Labeling Data in ACM.
segment.target: For information about labels, see Labeling Data in ACM.

segment.source: Using the Computer Dialog Box
segment.target: Using the Computer Dialog Box

segment.source: In the Computer dialog box, you can perform the following actions:
segment.target: In the Computer dialog box, you can perform the following actions:

segment.source: Assign categories and subcategories to the computer.
segment.target: Assign categories and subcategories to the computer.

segment.source: For more information, see Categorizing Your Compatibility Data.
segment.target: For more information, see Categorizing Your Compatibility Data.

segment.source: Specify the importance of the computer to your organization.
segment.target: Specify the importance of the computer to your organization.

segment.source: For more information, see Prioritizing Your Compatibility Data.
segment.target: For more information, see Prioritizing Your Compatibility Data.
